data.text: tataH param ahaM svargE 'param Ekam adbhutaM mahAcihnaM dRSTavAn arthatO yai rdaNPairIzvarasya kOpaH samAptiM gamiSyati tAn daNPAn dhArayantaH sapta dUtA mayA dRSTAH|
vahnimizritasya kAcamayasya jalAzayasyAkRtirapi dRSTA yE ca pazOstatpratimAyAstannAmnO 'gkasya ca prabhUtavantastE tasya kAcamayajalAzayasya tIrE tiSThanta IzvarIyavINA dhArayanti,

IzvaradAsasya mUsasO gItaM mESazAvakasya ca gItaM gAyantO vadanti, yathA, sarvvazaktiviziSTastvaM hE prabhO paramEzvara|tvadIyasarvvakarmmANi mahAnti cAdbhutAni ca| sarvvapuNyavatAM rAjan mArgA nyAyyA RtAzca tE|

hE prabhO nAmadhEyAttE kO na bhItiM gamiSyati| kO vA tvadIyanAmnazca prazaMsAM na kariSyati| kEvalastvaM pavitrO 'si sarvvajAtIyamAnavAH| tvAmEvAbhipraNaMsyanti samAgatya tvadantikaM| yasmAttava vicArAjnjAH prAdurbhAvaM gatAH kila||
tadanantaraM mayi nirIkSamANE sati svargE sAkSyAvAsasya mandirasya dvAraM muktaM|
yE ca sapta dUtAH sapta daNPAn dhArayanti tE tasmAt mandirAt niragacchan| tESAM paricchadA nirmmalazRbhravarNavastranirmmitA vakSAMsi ca suvarNazRgkhalai rvESTitAnyAsan|
aparaM caturNAM prANinAm EkastEbhyaH saptadUtEbhyaH saptasuvarNakaMsAn adadAt|
anantaram Izvarasya tEjaHprabhAvakAraNAt mandiraM dhUmEna paripUrNaM tasmAt taiH saptadUtaiH saptadaNPAnAM samAptiM yAvat mandiraM kEnApi pravESTuM nAzakyata|
